law.catch_line: The Maryland standard of identity for honey shall apply to:...
law.text:
The Maryland standard of identity for honey shall apply to:
All honey produced by honey bees from nectar;
All styles of honey presentation that are processed and ultimately intended for direct consumption; and
All honey packed, processed, or intended for sale in bulk containers as honey that may be repacked for retail sale or for use as an ingredient in other foods.
